title: XYplorer PRO v14.20.0200 Multilingual-CRD [ATOM]
description:
Description:
XYplorer is a tabbed file manager for Windows. It features a powerful file search, a versatile preview, a highly customizable interface, optional dual pane, and a large array of unique ways to efficiently automate frequently recurring tasks. It's fast and light, it's innovative, and it's portable. XYplorer is a Portable File Manager. It doesn't require any installation or changes to your system or registry. Take it with you and start it from a USB stick, along with your personal configuration. File management to go. 


Features:
Navigation 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tabbed Browsing. Cutting-edge file management using a true multi-tabbed interface. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The optional Dual Pane mode spells productivity and ease of use, especially for those coming from an orthodox file manager. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Introducing 6 Key Navigation, a way to navigate the whole file system one-handedly by just 6 keys. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dual Breadcrumb Bars show the path of each pane and let you efficiently navigate the whole file system. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mini TreeÃ¢â€žÂ¢, the author's favorite feature, is a folder tree displaying only the paths you have actually used. 

File Operations 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Queued File Operations with background processing. Enjoy the speed and safety of a Copy Queue. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom Copy, an alternative copy method featuring verification, safe overwrite, detailed reporting and logging, and more. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Zip Support lets you extract archives and add files to them, including by paste and drag'n'drop. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly create New Items from a configurable menu, a major time saver. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Batch Rename using wildcard patterns, variables, and Regular Expressions. Preview included. 

Searching 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The powerful and speedy File Search supports Boolean Logic, Regular Expressions, Content Search, and more... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The Duplicate File Finder quickly lists duplicate files in any location. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Branch View lets you see the contents of all subfolders of a folder in one list. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customizable Power Filters let you quickly focus subsets of files. 

Organization 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tag-Based File Management supports assigning individual labels, tags, and comments to any file and folder. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color-code your files by Name, Size, Date, Age, or Attributes to quickly spot what's important for you now. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tabsets allow you to conveniently store and load whole workspaces. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The Catalog is a favorites panel on steroids, serving as launch panel, drop target, and scripts library. 

Preview 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One-click Previews of all important image, audio, video, web, office, and font file formats. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The Floating Preview is a sizeable preview pane separate from the main window for images and documents. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The Zip View offers a very fast preview of the contents of Zip archives. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mouse Down Blow UpÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is supported for thumbnails and image previews. 

Information 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom Columns can show you everything you can possibly show about a file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Folder Sizes and Item Counts can be shown right in the file list, as well as the Age of files. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Copy Name with Path by Ctrl+P and similar useful little helpers. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The Hash Values of a file can be calculated and displayed. . 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One-click Reports on selected files, folders, or search results, including directory print in various formats. 

Automation 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ User-Defined Commands will reduce your daily routines to simple keystrokes. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Folder View Settings. Save and auto-restore the view settings of any particular folder. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scripting. Advanced solutions for advanced tasks. A power user's dream. 

Customization 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Portable File AssociationsÃ¢â€žÂ¢. Home is where your double-click is. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom File Icons means you can define which icons are shown for files and folders within XYplorer. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Toolbar. A configurable toolbar where most buttons have a specific right-click menu. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keyboard. Customizable Keyboard Shortcuts for nearly 600 functions. Have it your way! 

Safety and Accessibility 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multi-Level Undo/Redo for file operations, stored between sessions, allows you to fix today what you broke yesterday. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wipe is a method to securely delete files and folders beyond recovery. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access Control. Control which paths can be accessed, and which file operations are allowed. A corporate feature. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust all Font Sizes on the fly by Ctrl+Wheel, Line Heights by Ctrl+Shift+Wheel. The Toolbar supports Large Icons. All colors are fully customizable, Windows high contrast color schemes are supported. 

Last Not Least 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple key-based registration, 100% trouble-free. No DRM hassle. Customers are not treated like pirates. XYplorer does not phone home. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A clean and user-friendly interface, simple and elegant, makes working with XYplorer easy and intuitive. 



Supported Operating Systems:
Windows 8.1, 8, Server 2012, 7, Server 2008, Vista, XP, Server 2003, 2000, NT, Me, 98; 32-bit and 64-bit versions.
